comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mrs. Minogue knew what she was doing; Adelaide E. Minogue was author of The Care and Preservation of Records (Bulletin of the National Archives #5, 1943), and articles on related topics.

comment.author: 36535338@N07
comment._content: How cool that we have a picture of her!

comment.author: 19974730@N00
comment._content: She is the librarian all other librarians want to be when they grow up.
